callNumber.description: Call Number is an identifier assigned to an item, usually printed on a label attached to the item.

callNumberPrefix.description: Prefix of the call number on the holding level.

callNumberSuffix.description: Suffix of the call number on the holding level.

callNumberTypeId.description: unique ID for the type of call number on a holdings record, a UUID

copyNumber.description: Item/Piece ID (usually barcode) for systems that do not use item records. Ability to designate the copy number if institution chooses to use copy numbers.

discoverySuppress.description: records the fact that the record should not be displayed in a discovery system

effectiveLocationId.description: Effective location is calculated by the system based on the values in the permanent and temporary locationId fields.

formerIds.description: Previous ID(s) assigned to the holdings record

holdingsTypeId.description: unique ID for the type of this holdings record, a UUID

hrid.description: the human readable ID, also called eye readable ID. A system-assigned sequential ID which maps to the Instance ID

id.description: the unique ID of the holdings record; UUID

illPolicyId.description: unique ID for an ILL policy, a UUID

notes.description: Notes about action, copy, binding etc.

permanentLocationId.description: The permanent shelving location in which an item resides.

receiptStatus.description: Receipt status (e.g. pending, awaiting receipt, partially received, fully received, receipt not required, and cancelled)

retentionPolicy.description: Records information regarding how long we have agreed to keep something.

shelvingTitle.description: Indicates the shelving form of title.

sourceId.description: (A reference to) the source of a holdings record

tags.description: arbitrary tags associated with this holding

temporaryLocationId.description: Temporary location is the temporary location, shelving location, or holding which is a physical place where items are stored, or an Online location.
